title: White Knight

properties.name: description
properties.value: White Knights are found at the White Knights' Castle in Falador. The helmet's plume colour indicates the knight's level. The basic knights (red plume) have 36 Combat, the proselytes (yellow plume) have 38 Combat, the acolytes (green plume) have 39 Combat, and the partisans (blue plume) have 42 Combat. The partisans can hit up to 7 damage; all the lower classes have a max hit of 6. Players killing White knights after completing the Wanted! quest will lose favour among the White Knights.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:White KnightThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:White Knight
This article is about the monster only. For the organisation concerning the White Knights, see White Knights. For the knight between Burthorpe and Taverley, see White Knight (Burthorpe).

White Knights are found at the White Knights' Castle in Falador. The helmet's plume colour indicates the knight's level. The basic knights (red plume) have 36 Combat, the proselytes (yellow plume) have 38 Combat, the acolytes (green plume) have 39 Combat, and the partisans (blue plume) have 42 Combat. The partisans can hit up to 7 damage; all the lower classes have a max hit of 6. Players killing White knights after completing the Wanted! quest will lose favour among the White Knights.
